title: Add a Playlist
answer:
1. On the music tab page, slide to the artist or album or song, and hold the track you want to add. 

 2. Select Add to .... 

 3. Select the playlist to be added or to create a new playlist. 

 4. The added track can be seen in the playlist in which it is added. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109971) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109972)
